short_summary: delivery of  Toilet and hand papers for CSC for various establishments
description: ACQUISITION and delivery of toilet and hand papers for CSC for various establishments in Quebec
full_summary:
**RFP Documentation**
================================

**Notice Details**
-----------------

*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS3591134913-Doc3740154763
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: November 09, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 01, 2022, 14:00:00 EST

**Tender Overview**
------------------

The Correctional Service of Canada invites you to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the acquisition and delivery of various toilet paper and hand paper towels to Correctional Service Canada Institutions across Quebec. This tender aims to provide a standing offer for the supply and delivery of the required products as needs arise and orders are issued by the Institutions.

**Notice Information**
----------------------

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5 Canada
*   **Contact Person**: Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**: lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Requirements**
-----------------------

*   Suppliers must submit the required supporting documentation and bid submission by 14:00:00 EST on December 01, 2022.
*   Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   Suppliers must be aware of and comply with the following trade agreements:
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   All bids
